title: Den
text:
I like using redspot but one thing i'd like to see is when I use the car past the time I have paid for already, i'd like to receive an email or communication to let me know I have been charged an amount on my card and what it is related to. For example, I got charged $88.98. A simple email or sms to say : You have been charged for two more days for the car, for use on the 22/3 and 23/3. Thank you.
Because if i keep the car longer than just two days, one look at my cc and i see a lot of amounts being charged but can't clearly understand what exactly it is for.
Thanks
